scenario.name: Induction
scenario.author: Z. Cliffe Schreuders
scenario.description: You will need to find the unlock password somewhere.

input.value:
Dear Lucy,
I have made a mistake and I am pretty sure the Cyber Security people at Leeds Beckett are onto me now.
The campus is no longer safe, so I have moved all the money to one of my many offshore accounts. You may not hear from me for a while as I have to lay low.
I've left some critical information in an encrypted zip file for you in /var/log/. The password is a number of mine.
Yours, E.

You are getting close. The loot must be one of these accounts, but you will never guess which one.
